Boost your productivity, maximize your screen real estate, and stop tab-switching with Pip Pro. Pip Pro isn't just another picture-in-picture extension; it's a productivity tool that allows you to Picture-in-Picture ANYTHING. From full window content to custom-selected sections, and even tools like notes, Pip Pro lets you keep important content visible while working in other tabs.

Productivity Reinvented:
My mission is to turn Pip Pro into the ultimate PiP productivity app. The upcoming pro version will allow users to picture-in-picture interactive elements and productivity tools, taking your multitasking capabilities to new heights.

Pip Pro respects your privacy and system resources. I've optimized the extension to run efficiently, ensuring smooth performance without compromising your browsing speed. Also, I do NOT collect/sell any data.
